name: Tapering Tower
description:
Tapering Tower is a casual arcade game for accuracy. Build the tallest tapering tower.
You need to build a tower by setting the blocks in height, respecting the dimensions of the previous ones. If you overdo it and the block is wider than the previous one, then you will lose a health point, and if it is less, the tower will begin to narrow, creating difficulties in the construction. Build towers, set records and enjoy.
The game has a nice visual style and a soothing soundtrack, for a better gaming experience and a pleasant pastime.
